notes:
[Honored Hierarch] is a bit of a joke because it invites comparison to a much, much, better card. It is so, not the pick.

The pick is probably one of the red three-drops. People generally have [Ghirapur Gearcrafter] higher than [Akroan Seargent], but the reality is that it's very close and you could probably justify taking whichever fits into the kind of decks you like building.
